:orphan:



.. _sphx_glr_examples:

.. _gallery:

================
Examples Gallery
================
These examples demonstrate the behavior and usage of the
`ansys.dpf.core` module.


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-clear"></div>



.. _sphx_glr_examples_00-basic:

.. _basic-gallery:

Basic DPF Examples
==================
These examples explain the basic concepts of DPF.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="If you have ANSYS 2021R1 installed, getting running DPF is quite easy as ansys.dpf.core takes c...">

.. only:: html

     :alt: Basic DPF-Core Usage

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_00-basic_00-basic_example.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>

   :hidden:

   /examples/00-basic/00-basic_example

     :alt: Operators Overview

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_00-basic_01-basic_operators.py`

    </div>

.. _sphx_glr_examples_01-static-transient:

.. _static_transient_examples:

Transient Analysis Examples
===========================
These examples show how to use DPF to extract and plot displacements,
stresses, and strains from a transient static analysis.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Transient Analysis Result Example">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/01-static-transient/images/thumb/sphx_glr_00-basic_transient_thumb.png
     :alt: Transient Analysis Result Example

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_01-static-transient_00-basic_transient.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/01-static-transient/00-basic_transient

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Go Easily over Times Transient Analysis">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/01-static-transient/images/thumb/sphx_glr_01-transient_easy_time_scoping_thumb.png
     :alt: Go Easily over Times Transient Analysis

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_01-static-transient_01-transient_easy_time_scoping.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/01-static-transient/01-transient_easy_time_scoping
.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-clear"></div>



.. _sphx_glr_examples_02-modal-harmonic:

.. _modal_harmonic_examples:

Harmonic Analysis Examples
===========================
These examples show how to use DPF to extract and manipulate,
results from harmonic or modal analyses.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Multi-Harmonic Response Example">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/02-modal-harmonic/images/thumb/sphx_glr_00-multi_harmonic_thumb.png
     :alt: Multi-Harmonic Response Example

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_02-modal-harmonic_00-multi_harmonic.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/02-modal-harmonic/00-multi_harmonic

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Modal Cyclic symmetry Example">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/02-modal-harmonic/images/thumb/sphx_glr_01-modal_cyclic_thumb.png
     :alt: Modal Cyclic symmetry Example

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_02-modal-harmonic_01-modal_cyclic.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/02-modal-harmonic/01-modal_cyclic

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Multi-stage Cyclic Symmetry Example">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/02-modal-harmonic/images/thumb/sphx_glr_02-cyclic_multi_stage_thumb.png
     :alt: Multi-stage Cyclic Symmetry Example

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_02-modal-harmonic_02-cyclic_multi_stage.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>

   /examples/02-modal-harmonic/02-cyclic_multi_stage

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/02-modal-harmonic/images/thumb/sphx_glr_03-compare_modes_thumb.png
     :alt: Use Result Helpers to compare mode shapes for solids and then shells

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_02-modal-harmonic_03-compare_modes.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>

   /examples/02-modal-harmonic/03-compare_modes

     :alt: Read results from distributed files

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_02-modal-harmonic_05-read_distributed_files.py`

.. raw:: html

.. _sphx_glr_examples_03-advanced:

.. _advanced_examples:

Advanced and Miscellaneous Examples
===================================
These demos show advanced use cases demonstrating high level of workflow customization



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Multi-stage Cyclic Symmetry Use Advanced Customization">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/03-advanced/images/thumb/sphx_glr_00-multistage_advanced_options_thumb.png
     :alt: Multi-stage Cyclic Symmetry Use Advanced Customization

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_03-advanced_00-multistage_advanced_options.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/03-advanced/00-multistage_advanced_options

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Solve Harmonic Problem (with damping) Using Matrix Inverse">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/03-advanced/images/thumb/sphx_glr_01-solve_harmonic_problem_thumb.png
     :alt: Solve Harmonic Problem (with damping) Using Matrix Inverse

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_03-advanced_01-solve_harmonic_problem.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/03-advanced/01-solve_harmonic_problem

     :alt: Average Elemental Stress on a given volume

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_03-advanced_02-volume_averaged_stress.py`

    </div>

.. _sphx_glr_examples_04-specific-requests:

.. _specific_requests

Examples that targets specific requests
=======================================
These demos show how to solve specific requests. 



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Hdf5 export and compare precision">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/04-specific-requests/images/thumb/sphx_glr_00-hdf5_double_float_comparison_thumb.png
     :alt: Hdf5 export and compare precision

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_04-specific-requests_00-hdf5_double_float_comparison.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/04-specific-requests/00-hdf5_double_float_comparison

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Get reduced matrices and make export">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/04-specific-requests/images/thumb/sphx_glr_01-reduced_matrices_export_thumb.png
     :alt: Get reduced matrices and make export

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_04-specific-requests_01-reduced_matrices_export.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/04-specific-requests/01-reduced_matrices_export
.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-clear"></div>



.. _sphx_glr_examples_05-distributed-post:

.. _distributed_post

Examples for post processing on distributed process
===================================================
These demos show how to create worflows on different processes (possibly on different machine) and how to connect those together.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Distributed post without client connection to remote processes">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/05-distributed-post/images/thumb/sphx_glr_00-distributed_total_disp_thumb.png
     :alt: Distributed post without client connection to remote processes

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_05-distributed-post_00-distributed_total_disp.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/05-distributed-post/00-distributed_total_disp

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Distributed post without client connection to remote processes">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/05-distributed-post/images/thumb/sphx_glr_00-distributed_total_disp1_thumb.png
     :alt: Distributed post without client connection to remote processes

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_05-distributed-post_00-distributed_total_disp1.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/05-distributed-post/00-distributed_total_disp1

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Compute total displacement from distributed files with distributed post">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/05-distributed-post/images/thumb/sphx_glr_01-distributed_delegate_to_server_thumb.png
     :alt: Compute total displacement from distributed files with distributed post

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_05-distributed-post_01-distributed_delegate_to_server.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/05-distributed-post/01-distributed_delegate_to_server

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /examples/05-distributed-post/images/thumb/sphx_glr_02-distributed_workflows_on_remote_thumb.png
     :alt: Connect workflows on different processes implicitly

     :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_05-distributed-post_02-distributed_workflows_on_remote.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /examples/05-distributed-post/02-distributed_workflows_on_remote
